players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso - I investigated her last night and confirmed it. We need to vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why would you investigate Alice first night? That seems like a risky move for a detective to make so early."
You: "Charlie is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's a villager. Charlie must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob N1, he is villager. Charlie is lying and must be mafia trying to frame me."

Charlie: "Bob, think logically - if Alice were really the detective, why would she investigate you when I already claimed detective? A real detective would investigate me to prove I'm lying, not waste time on you."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why didn't you investigate Charlie to verify his claim instead of me?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
